title: How does technology empower the hospitality industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: By enhancing the Guest experience that can be created by the small efficiencies of being able to serve Guests better, faster and more efficiently. Order|Pay-at-the-table tech, kitchen tech to better manage orders, TOH tech to better understand how the business is successful, self-order kiosks that allow more choices for Guests, delivery apps, etc…the list is long.

In all “consumer-focused” fields, like retail sales, customers of all sorts come on their own schedules, and frequently in crowds. Technology cuts wait times, makes more information available more quickly, and reduces errors. Like any other tool used with appropriate skill, it can reduce employee — and customer — stress.
